managewiki-setting-wgAbuseFilterActions-: The possible actions that can be taken by abuse filters. When adding a new action, check if it is restricted in $wgAbuseFilterRestrictions and, if it is, don't forget to add the abusefilter-modify-restricted right to the appropriate user groups.
managewiki-setting-wgAutoBlockExpiry-hel: Number of seconds before autoblock entries expire. Minimum value allowed is 0 where as maximum is 10 years (315360000).
managewiki-setting-wgBlockAllowsUTEdit-n: Allows blocking users to restrict talk page accesst
managewiki-setting-wgBlockAllowsUTEdit-h: Allows the blocking user to grant talk page edit access for the blocked user
managewiki-setting-wgCookieSetOnAutobloc: Determines whether to set a cookie when a user is autoblocked. Doing so means that a blocked user, even after logging out and moving to a new IP address, will still be blocked.
managewiki-setting-wgCookieSetOnIpBlock-: Determines whether to set a cookie when an IP user is blocked. Doing so means that a blocked user, even after moving to a new IP address, will still be blocked.
managewiki-setting-wgEmailConfirmToEdit-: Require users to confirm email address before they can edit. This effectively disables IP editing.
managewiki-setting-wgProtectSiteLimit-he: Maximum time allowed for protection of the site.
managewiki-setting-wmgSimpleFlaggedRevsU: When enabled, this will only distinguish "checked", "quality", and unreviewed.
managewiki-setting-wmgFlaggedRevsLowProf: For visitors, only show tags/icons for unreviewed/outdated pages when enabled.
managewiki-setting-wgEchoUseCrossWikiBet: Enable Echo Cross Wiki Beta Feature
Feature flag for the cross-wiki notifications beta feature.
managewiki-setting-wgMediaViewerIsInBeta: This makes Media Viewer a beta feature thus this will not be enabled for all users.
managewiki-setting-wgPopupsBetaFeature-h: This enables Popups as a beta feature, rather than showing it to all users.
managewiki-setting-wgVisualEditorEnableD: Enable VisualEditor Diff Page Beta Feature
Enable the new visual mode as a beta feature on revision difference pages.
managewiki-setting-wgVisualEditorEnableW: Enable the new wikitext mode inside the visual editor as a beta feature. It has many of the tools present in the visual editor, uses a similar design, and allows better switching between the two.
managewiki-setting-wgVisualEditorShowBet: Shows a beta welcome for users of VisualEditor.
managewiki-setting-wgChatLinkUsernames-h: Link to user pages in the main chat window
managewiki-setting-wgChatMeCommand-help: Enable "/me <text>" command that prints a status-type message.
managewiki-setting-wmgWebChatServer-help: IRC Server to connect to, not required when using the freenodeChat web client.
managewiki-setting-wmgWebChatClient-help: This sets the web client to use. If you are not using Freenode, select Other Server.
managewiki-setting-wmgWikiLicense-help: Each wiki on Miraheze is by default licensed under CC-BY-SA 4.0 although this can be changed to another supported license. If you would like to release the contributions on your wiki under another license, please let us know so that we can make it available to you. Be aware that changing the license on your wiki can have an impact on your community and should not be done lightly.
managewiki-setting-wgRCMaxAge-help: Items in the recentchanges table are periodically purged; entries older than this many seconds will go.
managewiki-setting-wgActiveUserDays-help: The number of days within which a person must make edits to be considered an "active" user.
managewiki-setting-wgRCLinkDays-help: List days options to list in the Special:Recentchanges and Special:Recentchangeslinked pages.
managewiki-setting-wgCommentsInRecentCha: Shows comments in the RecentChanges special page.
managewiki-setting-wgCommentsSortDescend: This sorts comments by descending date, with the new comment box and most recent comments at the top when enabled.
